name: Future City Apartments Modern Battle Map
name_original: Future City Apartments Modern Battle Map
description:
"Tallo said it was here!" The stout ganger yelled from the otherside of Jolt's limp body as the two of you dragged him through the apartment building covered in his blood.

"Which one wire brain?"

"Over there." He pointed with his head. The door locked by a crypto-pad. Jolt continuing to bleed let out a soft groan.

"Hell with this scrap." You say blasting apart the pad and kicking down the door. The sounds of a crunching saw and the wash of cryo-tank gel hits your sensory array.

Also the two bangers with blast sticks pointed at your face. 

The doc didn't even bother to look up from the table, his shoes squishing in the blood soaked carpet as he danced around the cut open body on his operating table.

"Just toss the body on one of those mats, I will be with you as soon as there is an opening on the table." He told you while taking a hit from his hypo-vape.

The Future City Apartments is a modern style Table Top RPG battlemap perfect for Virtual Table Top systems or to be printed and used during your next game. The scene takes place in a futuristic apartment building that includes 5 separate and distinct rooms including a secret street doctors office with surgical equipment, a hackers hideout, a crazed resident with weapons, bullet holes, and a work bench, as well as two other residences. The map is detailed with plenty of background items to initiate a fun and interesting session while non-descript in any specific titles to allow for easy drop in into any game.

The map aesthetic works great for games set in a sci-fi, cyberpunk, dystopian, or any modern urban setting including Shadowrun, Starfinder, Carbon 2185, Cyberpunk 2020, or Cyberpunk RED.

The pack includes a single map with lit and unlit versions, as well as a version with and without the grid. All files are 300dpi. 

Included in download:

  • Future City Apartments map with grid and without grid
  • Future City Apartments map with and without lighting effects
  • Future City Apartments map with 1in grid broken into 12 tiles for printing
  • Future City Apartments is a 28x28 inch map at 300ppi.
